source_note: IEA says global DC capacity has almost reached 100 GW; electricity demand to more than double by 2030
GS estimates ~59 GW current capacity; 122 GW by end of 2030; 175% power demand growth vs 2023
McKinsey estimates US at 25 GW in 2024 tripling to 80 GW; global demand ~220 GW by 2030
MS sees ~150 GW new additions by 2030 (US); DC share of US electricity tripling from 6% to 18%
Bain baseline forecast: global DC capacity demand reaches 163 GW by 2030; twice today's demand
BCG projects 60-90 GW new DC demand in US 2023-2030; midpoint ~75 GW additions
BNEF projects US DC power demand of 106 GW by 2035; 36% higher than previous forecast; conservative
JLL estimates global DC capacity at ~103 GW today; nearly doubling to 200 GW by 2030
Macquarie: DC power grew from 26 GW (2015) to 81 GW (2024); projected 222 GW by 2030 at 18% CAGR
451 Research: US utility power to hyperscale/leased DCs rises to 62 GW (2025) to 134 GW (2030)
